mapper.update: update store_envelope_activity set delete_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_time is null
mapper.insert: insert into store_envelope_activity (id, store_id, total_number, total_money, status, start_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},now())
mapper.update: update store_envelope_activity set store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_number = #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_time is null
mapper.select: select id, store_id, total_number, total_money, status, start_time, create_time, update_time, delete_time from store_envelope_activity where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_time is null
